A = [562, 359, 1]'; % Ax, Ay, 1
B = [665, 359, 1]'; % Bx, By, 1

K = [
909.287609 0 887.641333
0 1036.71782 408.606680
0 0 1
];

% Vectors
a = inv(K)*A;
b = inv(K)*B;

% equation
angle = acos(dot(a,b)/(norm(a)*norm(b)));
d = 50 / (2*tan(angle/2));
disp(strcat(["Distance: ", num2str(d), " cm"]));

--------------------------------------
- Printer:
6x6, 480p

441.4cm

0.00000000e+00 1.03671782e+03 4.08606680e+02
0.00000000e+00 0.00000000e+00 1.00000000e+00
];
